This week, I'm studying Heritrix's source code to figure out how it 
works.
I have a problem presented as following.

in innerProcess() of FetchHTTP.java, the sentence

this.http.executeMethod(method);

will finally call HttpMethodBase.execute(state, connectioin), and 
result in calling connect.getResponseInputStream(), the returned 
InputStream is assignec to HttpMethodBase.responseStream. 

also in innerProcess() of FetchHTTP.java, after the above sentence, 
there is the following sentence,

rec.getRecordedInput().readFullOrUntil(.,.);

rec.getRecordedInput() will return HttpRecorder.ris, but I wonder 
how HttpRecorder.ris is related to the abovementioned 
responseStream, or some other response stream of http request.

thanks
